Name: CHAMELEON
About the game: Psychedelic Art Puzzle has returned! Four Chameleon sisters are in battle for their own territory! Features 1 color select Simple control! Just select one color of the 7 colors. 2 players mode Two players can battle and test each other's ability to think by off-line or Steam Remote Play Together. 3 rules You can play it on three rules. Basic rule : Occupy more than 50% of the field with your colors. King rule: Take more the King tiles than your opponent. Goal rule: Be first to reach the flag. 4 attractive characters You can select from four characters like Japanese Anime with their each abilities.
